shortdesc.ph: Updates the local user's spatial position.

p.codeblock: virtual int updateSelfPosition(const float position[3], const float axisForward[3], const float axisRight[3], const float axisUp[3]) = 0;

section.p: This method belongs to the class and needs to be used together with . The SDK calculates the relative position between the local user and the remote user based on the parameters of this method and , and generates spatial audio parameters accordingly.

plentry.pd: Position coordinates in the world coordinate system. This parameter is an array of length 3, representing the forward, right, and up coordinates respectively.
Unit vector along the x-axis of the coordinate system. This parameter is an array of length 3, representing the forward, right, and up coordinates respectively.
Unit vector along the y-axis of the coordinate system. This parameter is an array of length 3, representing the forward, right, and up coordinates respectively.
Unit vector along the z-axis of the coordinate system. This parameter is an array of length 3, representing the forward, right, and up coordinates respectively.
